hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Abdullah bin Mas’ud that the Prophet (ﷺ) said:“Among those in charge of you, after I am gone, will be men who extinguish the Sunnah and follow innovation. They will delay the prayer from its proper time.” I said: “O Messenger of Allah, if I live to see them, what should I do?” He said: “You ask me, O Ibn ‘Abd, what you should do? There is no obedience to one who disobeys Allah.”

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ طَاعَةَ فِي مَعْصِيَةِ اللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: There is no obedience through disobedience towards Allah
